author: cms-sw
body: This change allows to override a default package recipe with the one provided via cmsdist/system directory e.g. if one wants to use system `rpm, rpmbuild` instead of building via cmsdist then one can use `--use-system-tools rpm` and provide a cmsdist/system/rpm.spec on how package it ( e.g. setting default env and other macros to be used by cmsdist externals)
title: allow to provide system spec for system tools
